page.title: 04HAIRSTYLES
page.content: Hairstyles come and go. Most of the styles are to do with a flicked fringe. The most common one is called a wedge and the common colours for hair is brown and blond. Although you do get the odd pink or green colour, but that is only really "punks" that wear it. Long hair is in fashion for girls who are under twelve, but over that age there aren't many girls with hair below their shoulders. All boys styles are the same, that is the normal short back and sides.Occasionally you see a boy with hair below his shoulders, but that isn't very often.
